resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104951</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104951</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Space Shuttle O-ring failure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platz-Doppelventilkegel-O-Ring Ausfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Panne de bague de navette spatiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Falha do anel-O do shuttle de espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guasto dell'anello a "cso" della spola di spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαστημική o-ring σαϊτών αποτυχία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Incidente del anillo o de la lanzadera de espacio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will use a TI82 or TI83 calculator to construct a scatterplot, find the equation of the least-squares regression line for a set of data, find the coefficient of determination, and make predictions by using the line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer benutzen einen Rechner TI82 oder 
TI83, um ein scatterplot zu konstruieren, die Gleichung der 
least-squares Regressionslinie für ein Set Daten zu finden, den 
Koeffizienten von Ermittlung zu finden, und Vorhersagen zu bilden, 
indem sie die Zeile verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants utiliseront une calculatrice TI82 
ou TI83 pour construire un scatterplot, pour trouver l'équation de la
ligne de régression des moindres carrés pour un ensemble de 
données, pour trouver le coefficient de détermination, et pour faire
des prévisions en utilisant la ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usarão uma calculadora TI82 ou TI83
construir um scatterplot, encontrar a equação da linha de regressão
least-squares para um jogo dos dados, encontrar o coeficiente da 
determinação, e fazer predições usando a linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi utilizzeranno un calcolatore TI82 o 
TI83 per costruire uno scatterplot, per trovare l'equazione della riga
di regressione di minimi quadrati per un insieme dei dati, per trovare
il coefficente di determinazione e per fare le previsioni usando la 
riga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν TI82 ή TI83 
υπολογιστής για να κατασκευάσουν ένα scatterplot, να βρούν την 
εξίσωση της least-squares γραμμής παλινδρόμησης για ένα σύνολο
στοιχείων, να βρούν το συντελεστή του προσδιορισμού, και να 
κάνουν τις προβλέψεις με τη χρησιμοποίηση της γραμμής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizarán una calculadora TI82 o
TI83 para construir un scatterplot, para encontrar la ecuación de la 
línea de regresión least-squares para un conjunto de datos, para 
encontrar el coeficiente de determinación, y para hacer predicciones 
usando la línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BRENDA GOFORTH
FN:BRENDA GOFORTH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104951</entry>
    </identifier>
